hadiths.text: It was narrated that Ibn 'Umar said:"The Messenger of Allah said: "Volume is to be measured according to the system of the people of Al-Madinah, and weight is to be measured according to the system of the peole of Makkah."' (Sahih) This is the wording of Ishaq (one of the narrators)

chapter.eng-name: Allowing more when weighing goods for sale
